import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Houselisting.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HouseListing=()=>{const[houses,setHouses]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{// Fetch house data from your local API
axios.get('http://localhost:3000/houses').then(response=>{setHouses(response.data);setLoading(false);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching house data:',error);setError('Failed to load house data.');setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error});}if(houses.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No houses available at the moment."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"house-listing",children:houses.map(house=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"house-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slideshow",children:house.images.map((image,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:`House ${house.id} - ${index}`},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"details-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Price: $",house.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Type: ",house.type]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:house.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:`/houses/${house.id}`,className:"details-link",children:"View Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"book-visit-button",children:"Book Visit"})]})]})]},house.id))});};export default HouseListing;
